item.title: 红杉资本、Accel资本支持的Ethos Technologies公司计划在美国IPO中实现13亿美元估值
item.description: 由风险投资公司Accel和红杉资本支持的Ethos Technologies周二表示，其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）的目标估值高达12.6亿美元，随着保险行业IPO热潮延续至2026年。【原文：Ethos ​Technologies, backed by venture ‌capital firms Accel and Sequoia, said on Tuesday it was targeting a valuation of up ‌to $1.26 billion in its U.S. ​initial public offering, as the insurance IPO momentum extends into 2026.】

item.title: 诺瓦瓦克斯与辉瑞达成疫苗开发许可协议
item.description: 诺瓦瓦克斯公司周二宣布，已与辉瑞公司达成许可协议，共同开发传染病疫苗产品。【原文：Novavax said on Tuesday it was entering into a licensing agreement with Pfizer to develop vaccine products for infectious diseases.】

item.title: 美国贷款机构KeyCorp因利息收入增加而超出第四季度盈利预期
item.description: KeyCorp周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这家美国贷款机构的利息收入和投资银行手续费均有所增长。【原文：KeyCorp beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, as the U.S. lender earned higher interest and investment banking fees.】

item.title: 美国银行将向非管理层员工授予价值10亿美元的股票
item.description: 美国银行周二宣布，将在利润激增的强劲财年收官之际，向除高级管理层外的全体员工发放约10亿美元股权奖励。【原文：Bank of America said on Tuesday it will award about $1 billion in equity to all employees except senior management, after the lender capped a strong year marked by a surge in profits.】

item.title: 奈飞提交修订后的全现金收购华纳兄弟要约，获得董事会支持
item.description: 奈飞以全现金方式收购华纳兄弟探索公司旗下影视制作及流媒体业务的报价获得HBO母公司董事会全票支持，且未提高827亿美元的收购价，此举旨在阻断竞争对手派拉蒙的收购企图。【原文：Netflix switched to an all-cash offer for Warner Bros Discovery's studio and streaming businesses with unanimous support from the HBO owner's board without increasing the $82.7 billion price, in an effort to close the door on rival Paramount's efforts.】

item.title: 买家抛售日本国债，高市早苗上任即大举支出
item.description: 日本政府债券正处于自由落体状态，投资者对竞选期间竞相增加支出的氛围持悲观态度。在发达国家中负债最重的经济体里，政客们正争相削减税收。【原文：Japan's government bonds are in free fall as investors take a dim view of an atmosphere of competitive spending on the hustings, where politicians are jostling to cut taxes in an economy with the heaviest debt burden in the developed world.】

item.title: 贝森特称，特朗普最早可能在下周作出美联储主席人选决定
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周二表示，唐纳德·特朗普总统最早可能在下周就美国联邦储备委员会下任主席人选作出决定。【原文：President Donald Trump may reach a decision on the next chairman of the U.S. Federal Reserve as early as next week, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 跨大西洋的暴怒
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 3M第四季度利润超预期，成本削减推动利润率提升
item.description: 工业巨头3M周二公布的第四季度经调整利润超出华尔街预期，成本削减与提价举措推动其利润率实现改善。【原文：Industrial giant 3M posted fourth-quarter adjusted profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as cost cuts and price hikes drove an ‌improvement in margins.】

item.title: 美国IT硬件股下跌，因摩根士丹利对该行业持谨慎态度
item.description: 美国IT硬件股周二下跌，此前摩根士丹利下调了对该行业的评级，警告称随着企业需求放缓和零部件成本上升，公司可能大幅削减支出预算。【原文：U.S. IT hardware stocks fell on Tuesday after Morgan Stanley downgraded its view on the industry, warning that companies could drastically reduce their spending budgets as enterprise demand slows and component costs rise.】

item.title: 激进投资者今年不打算好好合作，他们正瞄准更多企业拆分。
item.description: 去年那些耐心敦促企业变革的激进投资者，在2026年将不再那么温和。【原文：Corporate agitators who patiently prodded companies for changes last year will not be as nice in 2026.】

item.title: 艾比瓦克斯首席执行官驳斥有关礼来公司收购传闻的"噪音"
item.description: 法国制药巨头礼来公司可能收购Abivax公司的报道被该公司首席执行官马克·德·加里德尔斥为"噪音"。他表示，市场对法国监管机构正在进行审查的猜测与法国外资监管机制的运作方式不符。【原文：Abivax Chief Executive Marc de Garidel dismissed as "noise" reports in the French press that pharmaceutical giant Eli Lilly may take over his company, and said market speculation about an ongoing review by French authorities was inconsistent with how French foreign-investment oversight works.】

item.title: 标普、纳斯达克期货因格陵兰担忧跌至一个月低点
item.description: 标普500指数和纳斯达克期货周二跌至一个月低点，因美国交易员结束长周末假期后，目睹全球市场遭遇重挫——此前特朗普总统因格陵兰岛归属问题再度对欧洲发出关税威胁。【原文：S&P 500 and Nasdaq ​futures sank to one-month lows on Tuesday, as U.S. traders returned from a long ‌weekend to witness a rout in global markets after President Donald Trump renewed his tariff threats against Europe over control of Greenland.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利称地缘政治和贸易紧张局势构成金融风险
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁·贝利周二表示，地缘政治不确定性和全球贸易紧张局势的程度，是央行在寻求管理金融体系对经济构成风险时的一项重要考量因素。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said on Tuesday that the level of geopolitical uncertainty and global trade tensions represented a big consideration for the central bank as it seeks to manage risks to the economy from the financial system.】

item.title: 诺华首席执行官向CNBC表示，公司预计将在2026年中期消除美国关税风险
item.description: 诺华首席执行官瓦斯·纳拉辛汉周二向CNBC表示，他预计该公司与美国政府的协议以及在该国不断扩大的生产布局，将使其免受潜在关税的影响。【原文：Novartis CEO Vas Narasimhan told CNBC on Tuesday he expects the drugmaker's agreement with the U.S. government and its expanding manufacturing footprint in the country to protect it from potential tariffs.】

item.title: 莱昂纳多公司就芬坎蒂尼合并言论改口
item.description: 莱昂纳多公司董事长周二收回了此前关于可能与意大利芬坎蒂尼造船公司合并的言论，称这些话只是开玩笑。【原文：Leonardo's chairman on Tuesday rowed back on comments he made about a possible merger with Italian shipbuilder Fincantieri , dismissing them as a light-hearted quip.】

item.title: 台湾英业达表示，关于英伟达H200芯片的决策"似乎在中国方面陷入僵局"
item.description: Taiwanese server maker Inventec said on Tuesday that a decision on whether Nvidia will be able to sell its H200 artificial intelligence chip in China "appears to be stuck on the China side".

item.title: 据消息人士透露，沃尔玛支持的PhonePe已获得印度证券交易委员会批准在印度上市。
item.description: 知情人士周二向路透社透露，沃尔玛旗下的印度支付公司PhonePe已获得市场监管机构批准上市。该公司于9月秘密提交了首次公开募股申请。【原文：Walmart-backed Indian payments firm PhonePe has received regulatory approval for its stock market listing from the market regulator after confidentially filing for an initial public offering in September, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 兰博基尼2025年全球交付量创纪录达10,747辆
item.description: 意大利豪华跑车制造商兰博基尼周二表示，2025年全球交付量达10,747辆，较上年略有提升，创下历史新高。【原文：Italian luxury sports carmaker Lamborghini said on Tuesday it delivered 10,747 vehicles worldwide in 2025, slightly improving on its prior-year performance and achieving an all-time record.】

item.title: QinetiQ将调整美国业务以契合特朗普的国防优先事项
item.description: 英国国防与安全集团QinetiQ周二表示，正将其美国业务调整至符合特朗普政府优先事项的方向。此前美国总统特朗普呼吁对美国国防工业进行全面改革。【原文：British defence and security group QinetiQ said on Tuesday it is aligning its U.S. business to the administration's priorities, after President Donald Trump's recent call for sweeping changes to America's defense industry.】

item.title: 美银调查显示：对冲策略失效，全球投资者陷入"超级牛市"狂热
item.description: 美国银行周二公布的调查显示，全球基金经理的乐观情绪达到2021年7月以来最高水平，对经济增长的乐观预期大幅攀升，现金持有比例则降至创纪录低点3.2%。【原文：Global fund managers are the most bullish since July 2021, January's Bank of America survey showed on Tuesday, with growth optimism jumping and cash levels sinking to a record low 3.2%.】

item.title: 阿斯利康将于2月从纳斯达克退市，转至纽约证券交易所上市
item.description: 阿斯利康周二宣布，将于2026年1月30日市场收盘后，将其美国存托凭证及债务证券从纳斯达克退市，并在纽约证券交易所完成普通股及债务的直接上市。【原文：AstraZeneca on Tuesday said it would delist its American Depositary Shares and debt securities from Nasdaq and complete a direct listing of its ordinary shares and debt on the New York Stock Exchange, effective after market close on January 30, 2026.】

item.title: 雷诺2025年销量增长3%，得益于Clio和Sandero车型销量提升
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺集团(RENA.PA)周二表示，2025年其销量增长3.2%，因乘用车需求强劲——尤其在海外市场——抵消了欧洲厢式货车销量暴跌的影响。【原文：French automaker Renault Group RENA.PA said on Tuesday that its sales volumes rose 3.2% in 2025, as strong demand for its passenger vehicles, particularly overseas, helped offset a plunge in European van sales.】

item.title: 加拿大央行行长卡尼力图引领新的全球贸易秩序，减少对美国的依赖
item.description: 加拿大总理马克·卡尼正试图通过与中国加强合作并签署小型贸易协议来推动建立新的全球贸易秩序，但加拿大经济对美国的过度依赖仍对其构成制约。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney is trying to foster a new global trading order by working more closely with China and inking smaller trade deals, but faces constraints from Canada's still overwhelming economic dependency on the United States.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对法国葡萄酒征收200%关税，迫使马克龙加入和平阵营
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普威胁对法国葡萄酒和香槟征收200%的关税，此举显然是试图诱使法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙加入其旨在解决全球冲突的"和平委员会"倡议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to hit French wines and champagnes with 200% tariffs in an apparent effort to cajole French President Emmanuel Macron into joining his Board of Peace initiative aimed at resolving global conflicts.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：抛售美国，抛售日本
item.description: 汤姆·韦斯特布鲁克带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 中国计划出台新措施刺激消费，将重心转向服务业
item.description: 中国国家发展和改革委员会周二表示，中国计划推出2026至2030年期间的新政策，以刺激国内消费并解决"突出的"供需失衡问题，服务业将成为重点关注领域。【原文：China plans to roll out new policies for 2026 to 2030 to spur domestic consumption and tackle "prominent" supply-demand imbalances, with the services sector becoming a key focus, the country's state planner said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本央行将暗示更多加息，因日元贬值与政治因素助推通胀风险
item.description: 日本央行预计将于周五上调经济增长预期，并释放进一步加息的信号。近期日元贬值及强劲薪资增长前景促使政策制定者保持警惕，以遏制通胀压力。【原文：The Bank of Japan is expected to raise its growth forecast on Friday and signal its readiness to hike interest rates further, as recent yen falls and prospects of solid wage gains keep policymakers alert to containing inflationary pressure.】

item.title: 台湾表示将与美国共同引领"民主"高科技供应链
item.description: 台湾首席谈判代表周二表示，台湾旨在与美国建立"民主"高科技供应链，并在上周与华盛顿达成的关税协议框架下形成战略性人工智能伙伴关系。【原文：Taiwan aims to build a "democratic" high-tech supply chain with the United States and form a strategic AI partnership under the new tariffs deal it sealed with Washington last week, Taipei's top negotiator in the talks said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着美国订单减少，中国销售人员在新市场面临艰苦奋斗
item.description: 2025年，中国出口商品创历史新高，但出口销售员陈艾米表示，这是她近二十年职业生涯中最艰难的一年。【原文：China sold more goods to the world than ever in 2025, but export saleswoman Aimee Chen says it was the hardest of her roughly two-decade career.】
